mapper.sql: id, name, code, description, organization_id, is_enabled, image_url, object_version_number, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date, type, category
mapper.update: update iam_project set name = #{project.name}, description=#{project.description}, image_url=#{project.imageUrl}, last_updated_by=#{project.lastUpdatedBy}, last_update_date=#{project.lastUpdateDate}, type=#{project.type}, category=#{project.category} where id = #{project.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT fd.id as id, fd.code as code, fd.organization_id as organization_id, fd.is_enabled as is_enabled , fd.image_url as image_url, fd.name as name , fd.created_by, fd.category as category, fd.creation_date as creation_date, iu.real_name as real_name FROM iam_project fd INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr on imr.source_id = fd.id INNER JOIN iam_role iro on iro.is_enabled = 1 and iro.id = imr.role_id and imr.source_type = 'project' LEFT JOIN iam_user iu on fd.created_by = iu.id WHERE imr.member_id = #{iamProject.userId} AND fd.organization_id = (SELECT iu.current_organization_id FROM iam_user iu WHERE iu.id = #{iamProject.userId})
and fd.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{iamProject.name}),'%')

select ip.id,ip.code,ip.name,ip.organization_id,io.name organization_name,ip.CREATION_DATE from iam_project ip left JOIN iam_organization io ON io.id=ip.organization_id where ip.is_enabled =1 and IP.CATEGORY=#{category} order by CREATION_DATE desc
